title: "testJMatrix"
output: html_document
---

```{r comment=''}
set.seed(999)
a = round(abs(rnorm(50)),2)
b = round(abs(rnorm(50)),2)
a = a[a<=1]
b = b[b<=1]
a = sample(a,25)
b = sample(b,25)
ma = matrix(a, nrow=5, ncol=5)
mb = matrix(b,nrow=5,ncol =5)
ma
mb
```

```{r comment=''}
hma = ma
hma[lower.tri(hma)] <- 0
hmb = mb
hmb[lower.tri(hmb)] <- 0
hma
hmb
```

```{r comment=''}
sum(abs(hma-hmb))
```

```{r comment=''}
200 * sum(abs(hma-hmb)) / sum(hma-hmb)
```

```{r comment=''}
ea <- eigen(ma)$values
eb <- eigen(mb)$values
dab <- ea - eb
sum(abs(dab))

sort(ea)
sort(eb)
dab2 <- sort(ea) - sort(eb)
sum(abs(dab2))
```

```{r comment=''}
sum(abs(ma-mb)/(abs(ma) + abs(mb)))
```

```{r comment=''}
sum(abs(ma-mb))
```

```{r comment=''}
sqrt(sum((ma-mb)^2))
```

```{r comment=''}
max(abs(ma-mb))
```

```{r comment=''}
sum(abs(ma-mb)/(ma+mb))
```
